name: Spacecraft Commander: Rogue Satellites
description:
Your mission, Commander: clean up rogue satellites.

[space] = thrust;   [<] [>] = turn.

Good luck.

After playing try some other great space games: simple rockets, FTL and Kerbal.
Also, the Mercury, Gemini and Apollo programs of the 60's and 70's show what can be done by driven teams of talented people.
